alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 2:48AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 possible. * WHERE...Duval and Jim Wells Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 3 PM CST this afternoon. For the second Freeze Warning, from 6 PM this evening to midnight CST tonight. For the Hard Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to noon CST Tuesday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
